RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 7. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICHOLAS JAMES reserved off the early pace down the backside, circled four wide while rallying to the head of the lane and wore his rivals down in deep stretch. FOX RED dueled on the lead from the rail to midway on the turn, settled back off the pressure, angled three wide into the clear at the head of the lane, came on again to regain the lead in the final sixteenth and was caught late in a game effort. UNCLE EARL dueled on the lead from between horses through the turn, shook clear briefly in mid-stretch and was outkicked late in the drive. BROADWAY JONES unhurried early while racing wide down the backstretch and made a steady advance from six wide down the stretch. ZELIG went evenly without threatening. TIDE RISING squeezed between rivals leaving the gate to drop back to trail and was never a factor. TWICE AS SMART pressed the pace from three wide down the backside, took a brief lead nearing the quarter pole and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Fox Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, settled, angled out, came again, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Nicholas James
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, circled 4w, up in time, wore rivals down

ENTRY.NAME: Twice as Smart
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, brief lead, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FROG TOWN tracked the leaders to the turn, rallied four wide around the bend, engaged the leader nearing the sixteenth pole and pulled clear at the wire. SIMPLY VALID set a pressured pace from the fence to the top of the lane, opened a clear advantage in upper stretch and was outkicked late in the drive. C J ALL THE WAY unhurried in the early going to trail and made a steady mild rally down the stretch. CINDY'S STORM went evenly passing weakened rivals in the lane. TOYI pressed the pace through the turn and weakened in the stretch. BOBBY'S GIFT contended early, was in tight on the turn against the rail, dropped to the rear of the field and was never a threat from there.

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby's Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: contended, in tight turn, dropped back, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONNARUMMA tracked the leaders down the backstretch, waited behind a wall of rivals entering the far turn, circled five wide on the bend, dueled through the stretch and got the head bob at the wire. MOONTAP was caught wide through the first turn, settled to race mid-pack from wide down the backside, rallied four wide into the turn to challenge for the lead turning from home, battled the winner through the lane and was out-nodded. FABIOLA PRINCESS prompted the pace to the final bend, took a brief lead nearing the quarter pole, was out-finished down the lane by the top pair while clearly the best of the rest. PURDY PUMKIN set the pace from the rail for the first five-eighths and had no response when challenged on the final turn. STORMIN MELLY stalked the pace and had no rally when called upon. POLITICAL ASTRAY broke wide leaving the gate, dropped in to save ground entering the first turn and never posed a threat. KESTENNA (GB) was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabiola Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace, brief lead, outkicked, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Donnarumma
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, waited turn, rally 5w, duel stretch, head bob

ENTRY.NAME: Moontap
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide throughout, rally 4w, battled stretch, outnodded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY PENNY ROSE unhurried in the early going to track the leaders, ranged up three wide with a strong rally on the far turn, cleared off in mid-stretch and drew away to the wire convincingly. LINE DANCER pressed the pace from two wide to the final turn, assumed command on the bend, was no match for the winner when engaged turning for home and kept on as second best. BOSSY LADY stalked the pace throughout and lacked a response when called upon finishing evenly. SICILIAN STYLE TWO set a pressured pace for a half mile and weakened coming home. EARLY BLOOMER was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Penny Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, ranged up 3w, cleared, drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Joseph A McFadden Jr. & Mr.& Mrs. Melody K Fews

ENTRY.NAME: Early Bloomer
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W

ENTRY.NAME: Line Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, assumed command, no match, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowanc es).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE RONS ROCKET hopped at the start giving the field a couple lengths, raced near the rear of the filed while under unhurried, patient handling, rallied five wide in the final bend to engage the leaders turning for home and pulled clear down the lane. INDY CARR tracked the leaders into the far turn, took a brief lead near the quarter pole and kept on through the stretch as second best. ORLEANS STORM slow away from the gate, was reserved well off the pace near the rear of the field and rallied in the stretch splitting rivals and showing good late interest. BIG TIME FLIRT was well placed three wide just off the leaders in striking position throughout and failed to mount a closing rally. CHECK THE FACTS raced well wide through the first turn, dropped to the back of the pack and passed tiring rivals in the lane. PLAYING BALL set the pace for a half mile and gave way turning for home. IPPOLITO'S WONDER stalked the leader from the fence and lacked a response when called upon. AGNELLO CITY contended from the rail down the backside and faded. KETTLE KING was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, reserved, split rivals, late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Little Rons Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, unhurried early, circled 5w, pulled clear

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Carr
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, bid turn, brief lead, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, fail to gain, even late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 30100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).s). s).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COUNTRY CLUB BOBBY set a pressured pace from the fence, disposed of the initial pressure entering the far turn, was immediately engaged by the runner-up, briefly surrendered the lead to that one in the lane, dug-in gamely to battle back and prevail. DARK VADER stalked the pace from three wide down the backside, moved up to challenge the pacesetter on the turn, briefly took a short lead in the stretch and was denied at the wire in a good effort. DERBY INCLUDED well placed along the rail in striking distance of the leaders, angled out four wide turning for home and finished with a mild bid to take the show. BEAT THE DEALER tracked the pace from the fence into the far turn, was set to a drive early and lacked a closing response. HITE raced at the back of the field to the stretch and passed tiring rivals in the lane. LUCKY STREAK went evenly never posing a threat. DOUGS MORNING PICK was not a factor. JOSH'N pressed the pace for three quarters and gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, long drive, no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Derby Included
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, angled 4 wide, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Country Club Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, responded, dug-in, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Vader
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3w, dueled stretch, brief lead, denied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 59. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or L ess Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEENIE ROSE unhurried in the early going to be at the rear of the field for a half mile, swept up three wide on the turn to engage the leader and crept away steadily down the lane. HERE COMES DOLLY tracked the leaders down the backside, rallied two wide in the turn to be dueling on the lead with the winner turning for home, could not go with that one but finished gamely as second best. SHAKA'S LYRIC set the pace under pressure down the backstretch, dropped back losing position into the turn and finished evenly to gain the show. OH EYE SEE prompted the pace to far turn and weakened coming home. ANGEL'S DESTINY rushed up to the leaders entering the backstretch while rank and pulling, took the lead approaching the half mile pole and gave way on the final bend. TWILIGHT BEAUTY was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Dolly
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, bid 2w, responded, no match, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, rank, took command, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY JASPER stalked the pace through the far turn, rallied four wide in upper stretch and spurted away when clear late. MOBIL CHIC tracked the leader from the fence while well held down the backside, rallied along the rail when the pacesetter drifted out turning for home and kept-on willingly in the lane to take the place. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS well rated on a comfortable lead, responded when challenged turning for home and couldn't last in the late going. I'M LEGIT trailed to midway on the final bend and passed weakening rivals down the stretch. WILLIAMSBEACHBABE raced near the rear of the field throughout, was set to a drive on the final bend and lacked a response. EMERSON JONES well placed from three wide down the backstretch, made a mild bid in the final bend and flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, well held, saved ground, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Emerson Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, 3 wide bid, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Williamsbeachbabe
ENTRY.COMMENT: long drive, no response, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rally 4 wide, took command, spurted away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & Choice OneBloodstock
